text:
Try to plan ahead to make 
your visits easier. Here are some 
suggestions:
• In some clinics you can buy 
refreshments. If not, take 
a snack with you if you are 
likely to get hungry.
• Write a list of questions you 
want to ask and take it with 
you to remind you. Make 
sure you get answers to your 
questions or the opportunity 
to discuss any worries.
• If your partner is free, they 
may be able to go with you. 
This can help them feel more 
involved in the pregnancy.
Maternity	hand-held	rec
